name: Regular
description:
Embark on a transformative journey towards mental well-being with our One-Month Mental Health Wellness Subscription. This subscription is designed to provide you with comprehensive support, tools, and resources to enhance your mental health and foster a sense of balance in your life. 
This One-Month Mental Health Wellness Subscription is a commitment to your emotional well-being, offering you the tools to navigate challenges, improve self-awareness, and foster a sense of inner peace.

name: Premium
description:
Elevate your mental health journey to new heights with our One-Year Mental Health Wellness Subscription. This comprehensive and extended subscription is a profound investment in your overall well-being, providing ongoing support and guidance for lasting transformation. 
This One-Year Mental Health Wellness Subscription is a profound commitment to your personal growth, offering sustained guidance and support as you cultivate resilience, self-love, and lasting positive change.
